channel.title: 718 - Convert money into item
channel.description: Hi, i'm hoping if anyone could help me out with this issue. Basically, i'm trying to convert a certain amount of money into a item when using a the certain amount of money on a object. My server is 718 revision. Say, I have 500m, and I would like to convert this into a ticket, (I'm hoping to make this ticket the Paramaya ticket), I would like to use something I can use the money on to transfer the 500m into that ticket and when using the ticket on the object again, transfers that into 500m again. Is this possible on this revision? If so, please explain to me how it could be done! Thanks.

item.title: 718 - Convert money into item
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

i found a tutorial for you:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/476251-how-fix-going-over-max-cash-my-way-matrix-718-742-a.html

theres something you could follow or help you guide in making it

Read full topic

item.title: 718 - Convert money into item
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Add something (a case or switch statement or what ever) to your clicking objects packet for when a player clicks on the object of your choosing.
and in that you’d make it delete the 500m coins, and then add the one ticket.
Obviously you need to check if the player has 500m.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 - Convert money into item
